sections.title: Hallo, I am Bruno Alexandre
sections.description: I'm 25 years old, I'm from Brazil ,I'm FrontEnd expert develop, Be Welcome!

sections.title: About Me
sections.content:
Web Developer 3 years of Front-end experience , and
Background performance. Extensive knowledge in website development,
marketplace and creating APIs.

Working in Front-End, working with language
directed at the object. Creating interactive visual concepts with the customer, 
using as main VueJs tools, ReactJs, NextJs ,
HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript applied
to EcmaScript 6+

Graduated in Bachelor of Mechanical Engineering, and 
my main languages spoken German, English and Portuguese as mother tongue

text_grid.title: HTML
text_grid.description: I have been studying and applying for 5 years, I have several projects that use html text tags

text_grid.title: NextJs
text_grid.description: When I started studying react, I fell in love with the componentization style and functional programming, with the evolution of the library, came the construction of the framework and with that I deepened my studies on it

text_grid.title: CSS
text_grid.description: I started my studies 4 years ago, but I could only delve deeper in this last year, using the styled-component, which allows me to use JavaScript in the creation of my css templates

text_grid.title: JavaScript
text_grid.description: It was the first programming language I came in contact with, from the beginning I saw its great potential, I gradually consolidated my experience with legacy projects, using JQuery, WebPack and Bootstrap 4, and perfected the use of its FrameWork.

text_grid.title: VueJs
text_grid.description: I started my studies with VueJs about one year ago, I've been developing increasingly complex applications from the same

text_grid.title: NodeJs
text_grid.description: My studies with node, was initially to be able to create my own Apis, which I was able to deepen with studies of MySqL, Postgres and MongoDb

sections.title: Projects Example
sections.description: Some pictures of my recent projects

sections.title: Studying
sections.description: Some tools In consolidating knowledge at the moment

text_grid.title: TypeScript
text_grid.description: I've just started learning, I've already worked with propTypes, and I'm updating them with TypeScript

text_grid.title: NestJs
text_grid.description: It's a Framework for Node js, I started studying it recently, it's super interesting and I already see great potential

text_grid.title: Python
text_grid.description: I started studying python to be able to develop my knowledge in data science, in addition to being able to work with a language linked to the object, I'm really enjoying it
